attributes.action: Arrange a visit to Israel by the Queen in 2017, the Balfour centenary year
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.jpost.com/Israel-News/Politics-And-Diplomacy/Rivlin-officially-invites-British-royal-family-to-visit-Israel-483585

If the Queen at 90 is unable to go then another senior member of the Royal Family should go
attributes.background: The Queen has never visited Israel during her 65 year reign. Israel is a close ally of the UK and there are numerous family ties. The Royal Family has been invited to visit Israel during 2017, the centenary year of the Balfour Declaration. An official state visit is way overdue!

rejection.details: This would be a decision for Her Majesty the Queen, and not the UK Government or Parliament, to take.
